title: Avro Arrow supersonic Canadian airplane documentary
description:
Avro Arrow supersonic Canadian airplane documentary

'There never was an Arrow' - 56 minutes DVDrip
Documentary from 1975, extra material on the DVD 'The Arrow' from 1997.

Surprisingly good quality in color, remarkable aviation and defence history, interviews with engineers, politicians and military representatives. More details and authentic footage about airplane construction, different explanations as to why Canada overnight ceased to be one of the world's leading airplane manufacturers and ended up with 15,000 unemployed on "Black Friday" in 1959.

Fullscreen, original mono sound, Xvid, 512x368.

Good article on http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Avro_Arrow
